document.full_text: the royal wedding of prince william, the queen's trip to ireland and the visit of president barack obama and the first lady have all served to add a sheen to britain's monarchy.
document.title: letter from europe: the queen and her family are on a royal roll
lines_and_colors: the royal wedding of prince william, the queen's trip to ireland and the visit of president barack obama and the first lady have all served to add a sheen to britain's monarchy.
